title: ISic000160. Funerary epitaph for Cornelius Acathobus
body:
Facsimile Images

d(is) m(anibus)
Cornelius
Acathobu-
s vix(it) ann(is) LV

Apparatus criticus

Text from autopsy

English translation

To the Shades of the Underworld. Cornelius Acathobus lived 55 years.

commentary

Mommsen judged the inscription to be fake, but Ferrua (1941) followed by Bivona (1994) considered it to be authentic, and there seems no reason to doubt it (other than its crude form and non-standard orthography). Whilst Acathobus is rendered here, Agathopus is more common across the empire, with another attestation in Termini Imerese, see ISic000235. Members of the gens Cornelia are extremely common in Termini Imerese.

bibliography

  • Castelli 1769 170 cl.14 no.39 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002084
  • Castelli 1784 184 cl.14 no.44 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002083
  • Romano 1838 40 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001618
  • 10.1084* https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • 1982.0419 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • 81 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002137
  • Ferrua 1941 261 no.19 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002655
